items.title: Awesome Jamstack
items.content_text:
### Tutorials / Articles / Automation

items.title: Awesome Libgdx
items.content_text:
### Tutorials / Advanced

*   [Dynamic Textures with Pixmap](https://javadocmd.com/blog/libgdx-dynamic-textures-with-pixmap/) - Details how to create a mask using Pixmaps.
*   [iOS Deployment Tutorial](https://link.medium.com/vgYo0mSi3W) - Deploying to iOS in 2019 using RoboVM.
*   [Sub-pixel Perfect Smooth Scrolling](http://code-disaster.com/2016/02/subpixel-perfect-smooth-scrolling.html) - Pixel-perfect smooth scrolling.

### Assets / General Learning Material

*   [Kenney Assets](https://kenney.nl/) - High quality assets for your game, from 2D and 3D art to sound effects.
*   [OpenGameArt.org](https://opengameart.org/) - Repository offering a variety of open content assets.
*   [Game-Icons.net](http://game-icons.net/) - Repository containing heaps of cool game related graphics.
*   [freesound.org](https://freesound.org/) - Huge collaborative database of audio snippets, samples, recordings, bleeps.
items.content_html:
Tutorials / Advanced

  • Dynamic Textures with Pixmap - Details how to create a mask using Pixmaps.
  • iOS Deployment Tutorial - Deploying to iOS in 2019 using RoboVM.
  • Sub-pixel Perfect Smooth Scrolling - Pixel-perfect smooth scrolling.

Assets / General Learning Material

  • Kenney Assets - High quality assets for your game, from 2D and 3D art to sound effects.
  • OpenGameArt.org - Repository offering a variety of open content assets.
  • Game-Icons.net - Repository containing heaps of cool game related graphics.
  • freesound.org - Huge collaborative database of audio snippets, samples, recordings, bleeps.

items.title: Awesome Stacks
items.content_text:
### React Firebase starter [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/react-firebase-starter) / Resources

*   [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/firebase) - A cloud-hosted NoSQL database that lets you store and sync data between your users in real-time.

### Strapi CMS with Gatsby [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/strapi-cms-with-gatsby) / Resources

*   [Strapi CMS](https://strapi.io) - [ğŸ™ (â­68k)](https://github.com/strapi/strapi) - Strapi is the Headless CMS developers love.

### Rock Solid Modern Rails [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/rock-solid-modern-rails) / Resources

*   [Rails](https://rubyonrails.org/) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/rails) - [ğŸ™ (â­57k)](https://github.com/rails/rails) - An established web app framework with a focus on simplicity and productivity.
*   [GraphQL Ruby](https://graphql-ruby.org/) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/graphql-ruby) - [ğŸ™ (â­5.4k)](https://github.com/rmosolgo/graphql-ruby) - Ruby server implementation of the GraphQL specification.
*   [Apollo Client](https://dev.apollodata.com/) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/apollo) - [ğŸ™ (â­20k)](https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-client) - A powerfully extensible GraphQL JavaScript client.
*   [Heroku](https://heroku.com) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/heroku) Developer friendly web app infrastructure provider with seamless Ruby/Rails support.

### Serverless Stack with React on AWS [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/serverless-stack-with-react-on-aws) / Resources

*   [Amazon S3](https://aws.amazon.com/s3/) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/amazon-s3) - Store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web.
*   [Amazon CloudFront](https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/amazon-cloudfront) - Content delivery with low latency and high data transfer speeds.

### Vue SPA with Laravel [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/vue-spa-with-laravel) / Resources

*   [PHP 7](https://php.net) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/php) - [ğŸ™ (â­39k)](https://github.com/php/php-src) - A popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited for web development.

### GCP Kubernetes Stack [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/gcp-kubernetes-stack) / Resources

*   [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) - [ğŸ™ (â­116k)](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/kubernetes) - Production-Grade Container Scheduling and Management.

### Rails Monitoring Stack [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/rails-monitoring-stack) / Resources

*   [Skylight](https://www.skylight.io) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/skylight) - The smart profiler for your Rails apps.
*   [New Relic](https://newrelic.com) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/new-relic) - SaaS Application Performance Management for Ruby, PHP, .Net, Java, Python, and Node.js Apps.
*   [Sqreen](https://www.sqreen.com/) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/sqreen) - Security monitoring and protection for Ruby, PHP, Java, Go, Python, and Node.js Apps.

### User Behavior Analytics via Segment [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/user-behavior-analytics-via-segment) / Resources

*   [Amplitude](https://amplitude.com) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/amplitude) - User analytics to fuel explosive user growth.
*   [FullStory](https://www.fullstory.com/) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/fullstory) - Capture all your customer experience data in one powerful, easy-to-use platform.

### Streaming Analytics with Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/streaming-analytics-with-kafka-spark-and-cassandra) / Resources

*   [Kafka](http://kafka.apache.org/) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/kafka) - [ğŸ™ (â­30k)](https://github.com/apache/kafka) - Distributed, fault tolerant, high throughput pub-sub messaging system.
*   [Apache Spark](https://spark.apache.org) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/spark) - [ğŸ™ (â­41k)](https://github.com/apache/spark) - Fast and general engine for large-scale data processing.
*   [Cassandra](http://cassandra.apache.org) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/cassandra) - [ğŸ™ (â­9.3k)](https://github.com/apache/cassandra) - Highly-scalable partitioned row store.

### Self-Hosted Devops and Collaboration [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/self-hosted-devops-and-collaboration) / Resources

*   [Zulip](https://zulipchat.com) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/zulip) - [ğŸ™ (â­23k)](https://github.com/zulip/zulip) - Powerful open source team chat.
*   [Hubot](https://hubot.github.com) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/hubot) - [ğŸ™ (â­17k)](https://github.com/hubotio/hubot) - A customizable life embetterment robot.
*   [Sentry](https://sentry.io) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/sentry) - [ğŸ™ (â­41k)](https://github.com/getsentry/sentry) - Cross-platform application monitoring, with a focus on error reporting.
*   [Taiga.io](https://taiga.io) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/taiga) - [ğŸ™](https://github.com/taigaio) - Project management web application with scrum in mind.
*   [Metabase](https://www.metabase.com/) - [ğŸ› ](https://stackshare.io/metabase) - [ğŸ™ (â­43k)](https://github.com/metabase/metabase) - An open-source business intelligence tool.

### React Native with Expo and Hasura [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/react-native-with-expo-and-hasura) / Resources

*   [Hasura](https://hasura.io/) - [ğŸ› ï¸](https://stackshare.io/hasura) - [ğŸ™ (â­32k)](https://github.com/hasura/graphql-engine) - Blazing fast, instant real-time GraphQL APIs on Postgres with fine grained access control.

### Workflow Automation with GitHub, Jira and Jenkins [â†—](https://awesomestacks.dev/workflow-automation-with-git-hub-jira-and-jenkins) / Resources

*   [Integrating Jira, GitHub, Jenkins, and Slack in your workflow](https://support.acquia.com/hc/en-us/articles/360005167214-Integrating-JIRA-GitHub-Jenkins-and-Slack-in-your-workflow)

items.title: Awesome Vehicle Security
items.content_text:
### Presentations

*   [Car Infotainment Hacking Methodology and Attack Surface Scenario](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F0mYkI2FJ_4) - A guide on how to attack, hunt bugs or hack your IVI by Jay Turla which was presented at the Packet Hacking Village / Wall of Sheep during DEF CON 26.

### Who to Follow

*   carfucar: Founder of Car Hacking Village and Speaker or Trainer
    *   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CarHackVillage)
*   Ian Tabor / mintynet: Car Hacker, Car Hacking Village staff
    *   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mintynet)
    *   [Website](https://www.mintynet.com/)
items.content_html:
Presentations

  • Car Infotainment Hacking Methodology and Attack Surface Scenario - A guide on how to attack, hunt bugs or hack your IVI by Jay Turla which was presented at the Packet Hacking Village / Wall of Sheep during DEF CON 26.

Who to Follow

  • carfucar: Founder of Car Hacking Village and Speaker or Trainer
    • Twitter

items.title: Machine Learning with Ruby
items.content_text:
### Machine Learning Libraries / Frameworks

*   [eps (â­681)](https://github.com/ankane/eps) - Bayesian Classification and Linear Regression with exports
    using [PMML](http://dmg.org/pmml/v4-3/GeneralStructure.html) and an alternative backend using [GSL](https://www.gnu.org/software/gsl/).
items.content_html:
Machine Learning Libraries / Frameworks

  • eps (â­681) - Bayesian Classification and Linear Regression with exports using PMML and an alternative backend using GSL.

items.title: Awesome Raspberry Pi
items.content_text:
### Projects

*   [Ceil (â­48)](https://github.com/helmuthva/ceil) - Auto-provisioned RPi cluster running K8S on bare-metal. ![Supports Raspberry Pi 3](https://github.com/thibmaek/awesome-raspberry-pi/raw/main/media/badges/rpi-3.png)
items.content_html:
Projects

  • Ceil (â­48) - Auto-provisioned RPi cluster running K8S on bare-metal.

items.title: Awesome Incident Response
items.content_text:
### IR Tools Collection / Log Analysis Tools

*   [Kaspersky CyberTrace](https://support.kaspersky.com/13850) - Threat intelligence fusion and analysis tool that integrates threat data feeds with SIEM solutions. Users can immediately leverage threat intelligence for security monitoring and incident report (IR) activities in the workflow of their existing security operations.
items.content_html:
IR Tools Collection / Log Analysis Tools

  • Kaspersky CyberTrace - Threat intelligence fusion and analysis tool that integrates threat data feeds with SIEM solutions. Users can immediately leverage threat intelligence for security monitoring and incident report (IR) activities in the workflow of their existing security operations.
